DOC.brief_summary: 1. i-gel 2. C-LMA Compare the effect on gastroeosephageal reflux Postoperative complicatios.
DOC.brief_title: Clasic Laryngeal Mask Airway(C-LMA) and I-gel Releated Regurgitation and Complications
DOC.detailed_description: 120 ASA I-II adult patients. Patients were randomised into two groups 1. i-gel 2. C-LMA Volume controlled ventilation, general anesthesia Asses Gastroeosephageal reflux, sore throat, coughing, dysphagia,dysphonia recorded.
DOC.criteria: ASA III Adult Elective surgery Bladder tumour Prostat hyperplasi Emergency surgery Hiatal hernia Gastroeosephageal reflux disease
